content: second stitch around and pull tight to close the top finishing you can either leave your hat as is or you can add any pom pom of your choice weave in any remaining ends enjoy your brand new tempest beanie pattern is property of above the clouds crochet changing or altering this pattern in any way is not permitted you are allowed to sell the finished products from my pattern but please credit me if/when possible please do not repost or re-write this pattern and claim it as your own permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing of any kind
